amendment.description: Amendment provides for an $11.7 million authorization for each of fiscal years 2005 through 2007 for commercial space activities within the Federal Aviation Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to authorize $11.8 million--equal to the amount currently appropriated--for each of fiscal years 2005 through 2007 for the Federal Aviation Administration's Office of Associate Administrator for Commercial Space Transportation, the office responsible for implementing the measure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
